text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Kare wa anata gata no ue kara, mata ashimoto kara, chōbatsu o kudasu koto ga deki, mata anata gata o nakamaware sa sete konran ni ochīra se, mata aru mono ni,-gai no bōgyaku o ajiwawa seru koto mo dekiru.' Ware wa, ikaga ni shirushi o shimesu ka o mi nasai. Osoraku kare-ra wa etoku surudearou
